The user briefly summons [[Katsuyu]], which sprays acid at the opponent in front of it.

== Trivia ==
* Initially, this jutsu was first used as Sakura's tilt in ''Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution'', with an alternative name.
